div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Ilini Central Middle and High School is looking for a secretary beginning in August. If interested, please send resume to Jennifer Durbin at jdurbin@illinicentral.org.

a.span: Student Supply and Property Pick Up Schedule

div.p: Illini Central schools will distribute student supplies and property on Thursday, April 30 and Friday, May 1. Student property will be removed from lockers, desks, and...
Remote learning has presented students, family and staff with a number of challenges. I want to thank everyone for their hard work and dedication to making the best of...

p.a: Event: 6th, 7th, 8th Grade Band & Chorus Field Trip

div.div: Wed, May 6 - Thu, May 7 , 4:30 PM - 6:30 PM

div.p: This is a reminder that Illini Central schools will distribute student supply and property on Thursday, April 30 and Friday, May 1. Please check the district website for the schedule and details.
ICHS/ICMS Principal...Mrs. Durbin answers the Illini Central Cougar's question about the end of the school year & what we have coming up in the month of May.
A PDF of these questions & answers can be found at the following link as well: https://5il.co/fn60
#WeAreIC
Good afternoon, Class of 2020!!
Seniors...please make sure that you are checking your school email on a daily basis...as we are preparing different things that need your input or something from you.
Take care & even though the last semester of your Senior hasn't gone the way anyone wanted it to...know that we are proud of you.
Keep checking that email, please.
#WeAreIC
Good morning Illini Central! We still cannot put into words our appreciation for our kitchen, transportation & custodial staff who continue to prepare & deliver meals to our families.
You are the best.
So, we will simply say...Thank you.
#WeAreIC
We have released a schedule for student supplies and property pick up April 30 and May 1. Please see the "News" section of the IC website for details
